message: The global tag generation might be slow though, as doctorjs is kinda sluggish (javascript's a tought language to parse)
I posted this thing a while back. Thought guys here might like to know read: https://convore.com/vim/turning-vim-into-a-javascript-ide-function-listing-and-syntax-checking/

This might also be useful, for adding jump-to-definition capabilities for Vim & JavaScript. Follow these instructions: https://convore.com/vim/how-to-jump-to-definition-for-whole-project/ & just replace the `ctags` execution line with `jsctags` (DoctorJS)
Excellent. I've been back and forth between Vim and Textmate. Going to try some of this soon
